subject: Football
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: The departure of the linebacker, who was arrested Thursday night and accused of drunken driving, hit-and-run and vandalism, continues an exodus since the team finished last season 8-8.
snippet: The departure of the linebacker, who was arrested Thursday night and accused of drunken driving, hit-and-run and vandalism, continues an exodus since the team finished last season 8-8.
